byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+

Purchase this BMW Ultimate Care upgrade to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

Price - $600 across the board for all 2017 model/series

Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer:
BMW Ultimate Care+ and BMW Ultimate Care+1 Bundle

Purchase BMW Ultimate Care+ to add:

▪ Replacement of specific wear-and-tear items such as brake pads, wiper blades and manual transmission clutch (for model
year 2017 vehicles and newer).

▪ Ultimate Care+ is transferable to a subsequent owner, should you sell your vehicle.

With purchasing this bundle, you will also extend your coverage with BMW Ultimate Care+1 for an additional 1 year or 14,000 miles for a total of 4 years or 50,000 miles.


Price: BMW UC+ $600 + BMW UC+1 price (which differs per 2017 model/series)
See attached price sheet


Legal Disclaimer:

Visit bmwusa.com/ultimatecare for details. For model year 2015 or later vehicles sold or leased by an authorized BMW Center on or after July 1, 2014, BMW Ultimate Care coverage is not transferable to subsequent purchasers, owners, or lessees. Please see bmwusa.com/ultimatecare or ask your authorized BMW Center for details.

Certain restrictions apply when purchasing coverage once your previous coverage period has ended. Limitations or additional fees may apply.

byooption.disclaimer: Each price is the suggested retail price and is subject to change. Price excludes installation and taxes.
byooption.longDescription: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. It provides a secure way to utilize these devices while in the rear seat of your BMW. This product is used in conjunction with our sturdy base carrier, which utilizes a modular plug connector. The holder can be easily clipped into the frame of the holder, which rotates 360° (optimal for watching films, viewing photos, composing e-mails, Facebook, Twitter, etc). Not for vehicles equipped with optional factory rear seat entertainment or optional sport seats.
byooption.name: BMW iPad Holder

accessories.description: The BMW iPad Holder is an attractive way to facilitate the use of an iPad in the vehicle. byoConfiguration.leaseOfferDisclaimer:
Offer not valid in Puerto Rico. Lease financing available on new 2018 BMW X4 xDrive28i models from participating BMW Centers through BMW Financial Services through July 31, 2017, to eligible, qualified customers with excellent credit history who meet BMW Financial Services' credit requirements.

Monthly lease payments of $559 per month for 36 months is based on an adjusted capitalized cost of $46,345 (MSRP of $49,845, including destination and handling fee of $995, less $3,000 customer down, $0 security deposit and suggested dealer contribution of $500).  Actual MSRP may vary.  Dealer contribution may vary and could affect your actual lease payment.  Cash due at signing includes $3,000 down payment, $559 first month's payment, $925 acquisition fee and $0 security deposit.  Lessee responsible for insurance during the lease term, excess wear and tear as defined in the lease contract, $0.25/mile over 30,000 miles and a disposition fee of $350 at lease end.  Not all customers will qualify for security deposit waiver.  Tax, title, license and registration fees are additional fees due at signing.  Advertised payment does not include applicable taxes.  Purchase option at lease end, excluding tax, title and government fees, is $30,405.

Offer valid through July 31, 2017 and may be combined with other offers unless otherwise stated.  Models pictured may be shown with metallic paint and/or additional accessories.  Visit your authorized BMW Center for important details.

©2017 BMW of North America, LLC. The BMW name, model names and logo are registered trademarks.

byooption.longDescription: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.
byooption.name: Heated front seats

options.description: A welcome feature for driver and front passenger in cooler weather, heated front seats quickly warm seat surfaces and backrests in your choice of 3 settings.
options.name: Heated front seats

byooption.longDescription: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views.  It allows the driver to select a "Split Screen" option, for simultaneous viewing of the Navigation map while viewing and selecting other items within the various iDrive menus and sub-menus.  The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
byooption.name: Navigation system

options.description: Navigation with iDrive 5.0 technology equips your BMW with an 8.8", high-resolution display.  The display provides vivid images, and permits multiple image options, including 3-D mapping and multiple perspective views. The iDrive touchpad can be used to "pinch zoom" the viewing area on the iDrive display within the interactive maps.
options.name: Navigation system

byooption.longDescription: A charging pocket in the center console allows you to wirelessly charge your smartphone. The charging surface provides wireless inductive charging with an LED charge-level indicator. This feature also adds a WiFi Hotspot including 3 GB / 3-month trial.
byooption.name: Wireless Charging and WiFi Hotspot

byooption.disclaimer: Apple CarPlay is a trademark of Apple Inc. CarPlay is compatible with iPhone 5 and later, and iOS 9.3 and later.  For best results, please use the most recent version of iOS.  Further information can be found at https://www.apple.com/ios/carplay/ Apple is responsible for all content and functionality which is displayed in the vehicle via Apple CarPlay.
byooption.longDescription: Available as part of BMW ConnectedDrive®, Apple CarPlay™ seamlessly integrates your iPhone to BMW's iDrive system. Messages, calls, Apple Maps and music are shown on the center Display just as they appear on your iPhone, allowing you to stay focused on the road.  Note: Requires iDrive 5.0 and BMW Navigation system.
byooption.name: Apple CarPlay Compatibility

byooption.longDescription: This system adjusts the damping characteristics to suit the driving conditions and road quality.  The damping changes contribute to a more stable-feeling ride.
byooption.name: Dynamic Damper Control

options.description: This system adjusts the damping characteristics to suit the driving conditions and road quality.  The damping changes contribute to a more stable-feeling ride.
options.name: Dynamic Damper Control

byooption.longDescription: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
byooption.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

options.description: OK to change lanes? With this feature, a warning triangle in your side-view mirror lights up if there’s a vehicle in your blind spot or approaching at a high speed. If you then start to cross lanes, you will feel a slight vibration in your steering wheel - a secondary caution to remain in your lane.
options.name: Active Blind Spot Detection

byooption.longDescription: Winter driving fun should not go down with the thermometer. The Cold Weather Package adds three heat settings to the front seats and welcome warmth to the steering wheel, while keeping the headlights clear to illuminate the road ahead in bad weather.
byooption.name: Cold Weather Package

byooption.longDescription: Retractable, high-intensity washers help keep headlights clear of ice, mud, road salt and other coatings, for maximum road illumination and enhanced driving safety.
byooption.name: Retractable headlight washers

byooption.longDescription: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; simply follow the lines on the screen that guide you into your spot.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Package

packages.description: The Driver Assistance Package is like having another set of eyes in the back of your head. Switch into reverse and everything behind your vehicle is shown on the Display screen. It also makes parallel parking a breeze; simply follow the lines on the screen that guide you into your spot.
packages.name: Driving Assistance Package

byooption.longDescription: The Head-up Display projects a multi-color image that seems to float beyond the windshield, just below your line of vision. It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
byooption.name: Head-up Display

It allows you to monitor preferred travel information, such as current speed, BMW Navigation system directional arrows, posted Speed Limit, Check Control data and more - without taking your eyes off the road.  Some features, such as Speed Limit Info and Navigation, may be optional equipment.
options.name: Head-up Display

byooption.longDescription: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.
byooption.name: Speed Limit Info

options.description: What’s the local speed limit? Even if there’s no sign in sight, this system helps keep you informed. Working in conjunction with the BMW Navigation system and other data, it shows speed limits on the instrument cluster display and, if so equipped, Head-up Display.

byooption.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
byooption.longDescription: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection. This camera- based system helps prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.disclaimer: Requires clearly definable lane markings that are not obscured by rain, snow, etc.  This feature is not a substitute for the driver's own responsibility in maintaining safe control of the vehicle.
options.name: Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
byooption.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

options.description: Driving should not be a contact sport. The many active safety features of Driver Assistance Plus help make you aware of pedestrians and other vehicles around you, while keeping you apprised of the local speed limit.
options.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

packages.name: Driving Assistance Plus Package

byooption.longDescription: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection.  These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
byooption.name: ACC Stop & Go + Active Driving Assistant

options.description: Active Cruise Control with Stop & Go maintains your selected speed; it also uses radar to keep your preselected distance from the vehicle ahead and bring your vehicle to a complete stop, if needed - a useful feature in stop-and-go traffic. Also included is Collision Mitigation: if the vehicle ahead suddenly brakes, you are alerted and, if necessary, the brakes quickly engage.  Active Driving Assistant is comprised of 4 active safety features: Lane Departure Warning, Frontal Collision Warning, City Collision Mitigation, and Pedestrian Protection.  These camera- and radar-based systems help prevent or reduce the severity of pedestrian and automotive collisions by using a combination of driver alerts and automatically priming and/or activating the brakes.
options.name: ACC Stop & Go + Active Driving Assistant

byooption.longDescription: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
byooption.name: Lighting Package

packages.description: Don’t just illuminate the road - enhance your nighttime driving confidence. Bright LED headlights turn to follow the curves in the road ahead, helping to reveal any roadside surprises around the bend. For added convenience, high beams can also be automatically turned on and off, as needed.
packages.name: Lighting Package

byooption.longDescription: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
byooption.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

options.description: LED headlights make everything on and along the road easier to see, helping to reduce eye fatigue - especially on long drives. LED technology is used for both high and low beams, as well as all 4 Corona headlight-rings. This technology is combined with the Adaptive feature: at speeds up to 35 mph, the headlights swivel to follow bends in the road, based on your steering wheel motion and other metrics.
options.name: Adaptive Full LED Lights

byooption.longDescription: Driving at night is easier than ever when your BMW is equipped with Automatic high beams. A camera sensor in the rear-view mirror registers vehicles in front of you, oncoming traffic and the quality of road light, and automatically switches between high or low beams, as needed. This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.
byooption.name: Automatic high beams

This adds to your comfort by not only maximizing visibility, but also eliminating the need to dim the lights manually.

byooption.longDescription: BMW Parking Assistant searches for a parking space, and does the parking for you at the drop of a command.  Ultrasonic sensors in the side indicators search for availability when traveling at speeds of up to 22 mph. Blue arrows indicate if parking is available on the left or right side of the road, while also taking care of steering as you select the correct gear and control the accelerator and brake.

byooption.longDescription: SiriusXM-equipped BMWs come with a 1-year trial to the Sirius All Access package.  You'll hear every SiriusXM channel available in your BMW, including commercial-free music, plus all your favorite sports, exclusive talk, entertainment and all of our premium programming.  Plus you'll get SiriusXM Internet Radio, so you can bring SiriusXM with you wherever you go - on your computer, smartphone and tablet.  SiriusXM services require a subscription after trial period. If you decide to continue your service at the end of your trial subscription, the plan you choose will automatically renew and bill at then-current rates until you call 1-866-635-2349 to cancel. See SiriusXM Customer Agreement for complete terms at siriusxm.com.
byooption.name: SiriusXM Satellite Radio with 1year All Access Subscription
